string.value: I've reached a limit to my training as a magician Is there a level beyond this? I should ask #b#p2020009##k who helped me with the third job advancement.
#b#p2020009##k told me to see the bishop #b#p2081200##k in Minar Forest if I want to find the path of becoming a wiser magician.
#b#p2081200##k said he will guide me to the path that will lead me to the magician's extreme power.
Long time no see. I'm happy to see you improved. Did you find the truth in your mind? Then you must have some reason to be here. What can I do for you?\r\n#b#L0# I want the 4th job advancement.#l#k
Yes. I was expecting you. But I don't have enough power to help you. Go to #bMinar Forest#k. #b#p2081200##k will help make your dream come true. Do you want to see him?
Then I'll recommend you to him. Don't be rude to him. May you find the power you seek!
Aren't you here for the 4th job advancement? If you don't want it, that's fine.
What are you doing here young magician?\r\n#b#L0# I want 4th job advancement. I have a recommendation letter from #p2020009#.#l
#b#p2020009##k?... That's the one who lives in El Nath. If she recommended you, I can trust you.
A young magician dreaming of being an Arch Mage. I have to tell you a few stories. Talk to me when you're ready.
Remember. The bishop of Minar Forest, #b#p2081200##k. Please see him.
You lost #b#t4031342##k? I will write again but be careful.
